localizedText.Button_Tooltip_CreateFolder_MissingSymbo: Create a new folder. You need write access to the 'Config' symbol of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_CreateRecipe_MissingSymbo: Create a new recipe. You need write access to the 'Config' and 'UpdateRecipe' symbols of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Rename_MissingSymbolAcces: Rename the selected item. You need write access to the server symbol 'Rename' for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Copy_MissingSymbolAccess: Copy the selected items. You need write access to the 'Config' and 'UpdateRecipe' symbols of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Cut_MissingSymbolAccess: Cut the selected items. You need write access to the server symbol 'Rename' for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Paste_MissingSymbolAccess: Paste the items in the clipboard. You need write access to the 'Config' and 'UpdateRecipe' symbols of the recipe management domain or write access to the server symbol 'Rename' for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Delete_MissingSymbolAcces: Delete the selected items. You need write access to the 'Config' symbol of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Activate_MissingSymbolAcc: Activate this recipe. You need write access to the 'ActivateRecipe' symbol of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_ReadFromTarget_MissingSym: Read values from target. You need write access to the 'ReadFromTarget' symbol of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Button_Tooltip_Save_MissingSymbolAccess: Save recipe. You need write access to the 'Config' and 'UpdateRecipe' symbols of the recipe management domain for this
localizedText.Popup_Button_Tooltip_OK: Apply the entered values and close the dialog
localizedText.Popup_Button_Tooltip_Cancel: Discard the entered values and close the dialog
localizedText.Popup_Text_ConfirmDelete:
Are you sure you want to delete the selected recipes and/or folders including everything they contain?
This action cannot be undone.
localizedText.Popup_Text_UnsavedChanges: Do you want to save your changes?
localizedText.Popup_Text_UnsavedChangesActivating:
Do you want to save the recipe before activation? Otherwise
the last saved version of the recipe will be activated.
localizedText.Popup_Text_ReadFromTargetError:
New recipes must be saved once before their values can be read from target. This recipe
could not be automatically saved because there are invalid values in some fields.

Please enter valid values for each recipe member and try again.
localizedText.Popup_Button_Tooltip_RecipeType: Open the recipe type selection dialog
localizedText.Popup_Header_FileConflict: A file with this name already exists
localizedText.Popup_Label_FileConflict:
One or more files with conflicting names already exist.
Please choose whether you want to skip the new file and keep the old one,
replace the old file with the new one, or keep both files.

If you choose to keep both files, the new file will be renamed by attaching a number to the file name.
localizedText.Editor_Checkbox_Tooltip_Optional: This property is optional. Check or uncheck this checkbox to include or exclude it from the object.
localizedText.Editor_Button_Tooltip_DateTime: Open the date time picker dialog
localizedText.Editor_Button_Tooltip_AcceptProperty: Use this name for the new property
